extends Numeric
    Raise the result of an expression by an exponent.

                                      java.lang.Double rhs)
        Calculate one Double number raised to the power of another.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        lhs - the left hand side of the expression; base.

        Returns:

      • calcInteger

        protected java.lang.Integer calcInteger(java.lang.Integer lhs,
                                        java.lang.Integer rhs)
        Calculate one Integer number raised to the power of another.
        Specified by:
        calcInteger in class Numeric
        Parameters:
        lhs - the left hand side of the expression; value.
        rhs - the right hand side of the expression; modulo.
        Returns:
        null if the exponent is less than zero, otherwise returns lhs ^ rhs.
